comments: Dr. Rea is always there with a smile and her energy makes the class a learning environment that is not boring. Really loved the topic of dystopia, because who doesn\'t like a good end of the world discussion, and this class made me think about my world in new way. I would take her again.

stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GET READY TO READ  CARING
comments: Dr. Rea is one of my favorite people -- and she\'s a wonderful professor with lots of enthusiasm and wisdom to share. If you\'re willing to show that you have a brain and are willing to put the work in, you\'ll be greatly rewarded with her respect (and good grades which never hurt!). She is truly a person who has tons of tidbits to share.

tag_professor: Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (4)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: Even though it was a pretty hard class I learned a lot from it. Rhetoric is not my favorite subject but she helped me a great deal. She has a passion for rhetoric and for her students to succeed. She is caring and friendly and always has a very warm smile.

tag_professor: Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (4)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CARING  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: I really liked this introduction to the Middle Ages and Dr. Rea was always fun and available. When the reading got hard, like with Chaucer, she would stop and help us understand what was going on. It was a survey class so I expected to have a lot of reading and have it be fast paced. It was clear that she understood and liked the subject.

tag_professor: Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (4)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  CARING
comments: This professor was really energetic and made the class something that I didn\'t dread as it was a writing class. She was always available for questions and I liked the way she moved around the classroom. So many professors are so boring. I learned to be a better writer and would recommend her to anyone.

tag_professor: Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (4)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: This professor is energetic about the subject. I learned more in this class than most I have taken at this University. Her tests are challenging, but she is fair. I didn\'t know what to expect, because the material was so new, but I liked being challenged to think. I would most certainly take her again.

tag_professor: Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (4)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: She moves way to fast and she isn\'t the most clear when explaining her papers. The assignments were pretty open ended, but I didn\'t feel like I learned all that much in her class. I wouldn\'t take her again. She\'s too hyper and she doesn\'t slow down. She has too many notes on the screen to write them all down.

tag_professor: Caring (5)  Gives good feedback (4)  Amazing lectures (2)  Get ready to read (2)  Participation matters (1)  Tough Grader (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Inspirational (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Hilarious (1)
comments: She is fabulous. Laughs a little too much, but makes the class fun, and gives everyone an individual thought process for the writing portion of the class. Very supportive on all levels, from new college students to non-traditional. Love her.

comments: Very helpful and nice. Easy course. She has tons of energy, which makes class interesting.

comments: Dr. Rea has to be the most energetic instructor Rockford College has ever had. She\'s very easy to approach with questions and for advice, and just all-around friendly.
